
CAEN RFID
---------
CAENRFIDLibrary.jar and RXTXcomm.jar origin from https://www.caenrfid.com . Have to register to download.
CAEN SDK did not contain license file but over e-mail they allowed to redistribute the SDK into open source project.
install_caen_library.bat script installs both jar files into local Maven repository.

SensThys
--------
SensThys SDK origins from https://www.sensthys.com .
Their SKD does not contain license file and the license which they sent over e-mail did not allow redistribution.
That's why SensThys SensX SDK is downloaded from their website with script.
get_sensthys_sdk.bat downloads SDK, unpacks it and installs jar file into local Maven repository.
